name: Boba Monsters
storyline:
Welcome to Slimecone Valley!

A disgruntled former resident of the town had crafted a potion to trade places with a human from the Above. That human just so happens to be YOU, but at least the monster who swapped places with you was kind enough to leave you the keys to their potion shop, which you decide to transform into your very own bubble tea cafe.

But a human cannot live in the Below for long…

This realm can only be home to the undead, which means you only have two weeks until your heart stops and you turn into a zombie!

Get a monster to fall in love with you and use their loving heart as the ingredient to get out of Slimecone Valley and return home…. OR ELSE YOU’LL DIE!

So what if you actually fall in love with a local Monster?
